adverbs.description: decidedly (comparative more decidedly, superlative most decidedly)

entries.meaning: In a manner which leaves little question; definitely, clearly.
examples: In a decidedly petulant manner she sat with crossed arms and a frown.

entries.meaning: In a decided or final manner; resolutely.
examples: ‘We can't,’ said Vera decidedly, ‘we haven't any boats and we're cut off by a raging torrent from any human habitation.’
